org.springframework.data.support

类 ExampleMatcherAccessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.data.support.ExampleMatcherAccessor
  • 直接已知子类:
    ExampleMatcherAccessor

    public class ExampleMatcherAccessor
extends Object
    Accessor for the ExampleMatcher to use in modules that support query by example (QBE) querying.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.12

    • 方法详细资料

      • getPropertySpecifiers

        public Collection<org.springframework.data.domain.ExampleMatcher.PropertySpecifier> getPropertySpecifiers()
        Returns the ExampleMatcher.PropertySpecifiers of the underlying ExampleMatcher.
        返回:
        unmodifiable Collection of ExampleMatcher.PropertySpecifiers.

      • hasPropertySpecifier

        public boolean hasPropertySpecifier(String path)
        Returns whether the underlying ExampleMatcher contains a ExampleMatcher.PropertySpecifier for the given path.
        参数:
        path - the dot-path identifying a property.
        返回:
        true in case ExampleMatcher.PropertySpecifier defined for given path.

      • getPropertySpecifier

        public org.springframework.data.domain.ExampleMatcher.PropertySpecifier getPropertySpecifier(String path)
        Get the ExampleMatcher.PropertySpecifier for given path.
        Please check if hasPropertySpecifier(String) to avoid running into null values.
        参数:
        path - Dot-Path to property.
        返回:
        null when no ExampleMatcher.PropertySpecifier defined for path.

      • hasPropertySpecifiers

        public boolean hasPropertySpecifiers()
        返回:
        true if at least one ExampleMatcher.PropertySpecifier defined.

      • getStringMatcherForPath

        public org.springframework.data.domain.ExampleMatcher.StringMatcher getStringMatcherForPath(String path)
        Get the ExampleMatcher.StringMatcher for a given path or return the default one if none defined.
        参数:
        path -
        返回:
        never null.

      • getNullHandler

        public org.springframework.data.domain.ExampleMatcher.NullHandler getNullHandler()
        Get defined null handling.
        返回:
        never null

      • getDefaultStringMatcher

        public org.springframework.data.domain.ExampleMatcher.StringMatcher getDefaultStringMatcher()
        Get defined ExampleMatcher.StringMatcher.
        返回:
        never null.

      • isIgnoreCaseEnabled

        public boolean isIgnoreCaseEnabled()
        返回:
        true if String should be matched with ignore case option.

      • isIgnoredPath

        public boolean isIgnoredPath(String path)
        参数:
        path -
        返回:
        return true if path was set to be ignored.

      • isIgnoreCaseForPath

        public boolean isIgnoreCaseForPath(String path)
        Get the ignore case flag for a given path or return the default one if none defined.
        参数:
        path -
        返回:
        never null.

      • getValueTransformerForPath

        public org.springframework.data.domain.ExampleMatcher.PropertyValueTransformer getValueTransformerForPath(String path)
        Get the ignore case flag for a given path or return ExampleMatcher.NoOpPropertyValueTransformer if none defined.
        参数:
        path -
        返回:
        never null.
